conversations.content: Create a new repository named new_project and make sure its contents are the same as bobolive/json_xml_parsing.

<|Function_Thought|>
The task involves creating a new repository named "new_project" and ensuring its contents are the same as the repository "bobolive/json_xml_parsing". The established steps indicate the need to first create the repository. It is critical to follow the plan sequentially for completion.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[git_create_repo(repo_name="new_project")]<|/Function_Call|>
Please verify your account to proceed the repository creation. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The repository creation for "new_project" requires account verification. A one-time password (OTP) has been sent to the inbox. The next step is to retrieve the OTP from the received emails to verify the account and successfully create the repository.

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Thought|>

<|Function_Call|>[verify_github_account(otp="328410")]<|/Function_Call|>
Account verified. The repository of 'emmajohnson/new_project' successfully created.

<|Function_Thought|>
